message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can end the game.
I'll take a slightly larger share, but still willing to negotiate
I'm not willing to give up 60% of the remaining money, Bob. I'll wait for a better offer.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. This split is more balanced, but I'm still not giving up too much.
I'm not giving in, but I'll meet you halfway
I suppose we're at a stalemate, Bob. I'll accept your offer. It's not ideal, but I don't want to risk going into the next round with even less valuable money.
